ygData.subject: Re: WIS items
ygData.msgSnippet: night shade wreath   mistmore on the maid mithril mask solb forget the mob sorry mithril tunic   lower guk live side  on teh crusader.  better bring friends
ygData.messageBody:
night shade wreath mistmore on the maid
mithril mask solb forget the mob sorry
mithril tunic lower guk live side on teh crusader. better bring friends
and be prepared to loose your faction
paw of apolla is a quest starts with vin moltar in qeynos sewers. follow
this forum for more info on who has what.

other then the paw you better plan on being around 35 and full group for
the wreath and 45+ full group for the mask

good luck

Danek Lonewolf
Fennin Ro 50 druid

----- Original Message -----
From: Jason Harrell <jharrell@...>
To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, August 16, 1999 4:16 PM
Subject: [EQCheats] WIS items


> From: "Jason Harrell" <jharrell@...>
>

> Polished Mithril Mask
> Mithril Runed Tunic
> Paw of Opolla
